name: Hart's Shoe Shandy
description: 4% ABV. A nice and easy Pink Lemonade Shandy built for warm weather drinking by the lake or long nights on the patio with friends.

name: Golden Rule Blonde
description: Kölsch. 5% ABV. A German-style Kolsch, light gold in color with a balance of malt and hops. German pale malts and Crystal hops create a beer that is subtle, not boring.

name: Saratoga Vibes
description: Lager - Other. 5.2% ABV. A crisp, fresh lager brewed with coriander, a touch of lemon and lime. Perfect for summer nights at SPAC.

name: Apple Cranberry Blonde
description: Fruit Beer. 5.3% ABV. Freshly-pressed local apples added after the first fermentation gives this beer a bright fruit character that is accented by just enough cinnamon, orange peel and cardamom. Cranberries add color and balancing tartness while pilsner malt keeps things beery.

name: All-In
description: IPA - American. 6.5% ABV. A hoppy American-style India Pale Ale with Amarillo and Cascade giving a fruity, grapefruit aroma while Polaris provides bitterness. German Vienna malt balances the finish.

name: Uncurious DDH NEIPA
description: IPA - New England. 6.5% ABV. Don’t let the name fool you, we’re always trying to find what makes a great New England IPA and have gone above and beyond to find the answer. The result? Vibrant yellow with an electric feel; Haze for days, and a tropical trinity of hops yielding flavors of mango, passion fruit and citrus that finishes sweet yet surprisingly clean. We’ll never stop trying to improve but we think you’ll like what we’ve discovered. So what are you waiting for? Aren’t you curious?

name: Honeybear
description: IPA - Imperial. 8% ABV. A smooth and creamy hazy DIPA fermented along with Honey then double dry hopped with Citra Cryo, Idaho 7 and Cashmere.

name: Strawberry Dare
description: Sour - Fruited Gose. 5.8% ABV. Gose style sour ale brewed with salt and coriander. Refermented with a pound of strawberries per gallon. Coriander adds citrus notes while the finish is refreshingly tart.

name: Not My Gumdrop Buttons!
description: Spiced. 5.8% ABV. Forget the eggnog and indulge in the Holidaze with our seasonal special- Gingerbread Ale! This literal libation of a gingerbread cookie will have you feeling like a roasted chestnut on Christmas Day!

name: Scottish-Style 80 Shilling Ale
description: Scottish Export Ale. 5.2% ABV. This malty Scottish-style beer has notes of caramel up front. Malty tasting through the finish, hops are used sparingly. Silver Award Winner at the 2016 World Beer Cup (Scottish-style ale category).

name: Dark Encounter
description: Lager - Dark. 5.5% ABV. Gold Medal Winner at the 2024 NYS Craft Beer Competition in the Dark Lager Category. A rich and malty German- style lager brewed for the colder months, using all German malts and hops. This medium bodied lager imparts a luscious, smooth and toasty flavor with hints of toffee and cocoa. Pouring dark brown with ruby highlights with a light tan head.

name: Oatmeal Stout
description: Stout - Oatmeal. 5.6% ABV. This is a rich, malty ale. Dark-roasted malts lend flavors reminiscent of cocoa and coffee. Oats add fullness to the body while roastiness balances the finish.

name: D-Light
description: Lager - American Light. 4.3% ABV. Our version of an American classic. Light-bodied, straw-yellow color with subtle hop character that goes down easy - this beer is domestic as it gets.

name: Electra
description: Sour - Fruited. 4% ABV. A low alcohol and refreshingly tart beer with electrolytes to give you the hydrating pop you crave after a run, bike ride or a few minutes in the sauna. Ease into you-time with Electra by your side. Electra is inspired by the arrival of KOS, New York's first floating sauna.

name: Lakeside Lounging Session IPA
description: IPA - Session. 5.1% ABV. Citrus forward hops pair with a light body to create a highly sessionable and flavorful hazy IPA.

name: Pineapple Haze
description: IPA - New England. 6.5% ABV. Pineapple Haze is back and better than ever! Dry Hopped with Tangier and El Dorado hops for a citrus forward hop profile that pairs perfectly with the addition of Pineapple. Soft, tropical and delicious.

name: Bro-mosa
description: Sour - Fruited. 5.2% ABV. 2025 NYS Craft Beer Competition Bronze Medal Fruited Sour Sour ale featuring a tropical array of hops and a secondary fermentation on tangerine, pineapple, orange and lime purées give this sour ale a velvety smooth, sorbet-esc flavor and aroma. Champagne and orange juice is for the birds baby! It’s Bro-mosa time!

name: Peach Apricot Dare
description: Sour - Fruited Gose. 5.7% ABV. Gose style sour ale. Brewed with salt, coriander and Peach fruit tea. Refermented with Peach and Apricot.

name: Winter Warmer
description: 7% ABV. The solstice isn't here yet but the weather has been chilly, so here is a malty, strong ale to welcome the season. The perfect beer for cold winter nights. Rich with caramel, molasses, and fruity flavors up front, finishing with a good dose of hop bitterness. Lots of Munich malt lends toasty malt notes.

name: Raspberry Imperial Porter
description: Porter - Imperial. 8% ABV. We set out to create a bold, complex beer that tastes like raspberries and chocolate. This rich ale is the result. We artfully blended six different malts to achieve deep cocoa flavor. Over a pound of raspberries per gallon were added to the young beer to provide fresh, bright fruit character. Complex malt and fruit but simply delicious.

name: Black Label
description: Stout - Pastry. 10.2% ABV. Bourbon Barrel Aged Stout - Aged for 22 months in Breckenridge Distillery Bourbon barrels and inspired by the classic dessert, Affogato. Conditioned on Kru Coffee's coldbrewed Espresso, Comoros Vanilla beans and Biscotti cookies.
